question: A "pneumercator" measures:
Under normal operational conditrons, the rudder is hydraullically locked unless ...................
options: 1) The manual trick wheel is engaged for steering
3) A normal rudder order is given by the control system
4) An electric power failure occurs at the steering gear
correctAnswer: 3) A normal rudder order is given by the control system

question: If one fuel oil strainer of a duplex unit becomes clogged while your vessel is steaming at sea, you should first:
options: 1) Clean the dirty strainer as quickly as possible
2) Change the strainer over to the clean side
3) Stop the fuel oil service pump
correctAnswer: 2) Change the strainer over to the clean side

question: Pre combustion chambers in a diesel engine:
options: 1) Require that each cylinder use two spray nozzles
2) Require the use of fiat crowned pistons to obtain turbulence
3) Permit the use of a wide range of fuel in that engine
4) Contain all of the air charge at the end of the compression stroke
5) Require that each cylinder use more than four spray nozzles
correctAnswer: 3) Permit the use of a wide range of fuel in that engine

options: 1) Right handed / right handed starboard / left handed port
2) Right handed / right handed port / left handed starboard
3) Left handed / right handed starboard / left handed port
4) Left handed / right handed port / left handed starboard
5) Right handed / left handed starboard / right handed port
